Messier & Associates, Inc.

Surveyors & Engineers

Messier & Associates, Inc. is a full service professional Land Surveying and Civil Engineering firm providing personalized “hands-on” professional services to private and public clients in the residential, commercial, industrial, institutional and municipal sectors from its office headquarters in Manchester, Connecticut.
